transcript: Hi, this is Carlos Ruiz, my date of birthday is July 28, 1985, and I stopped taking med for me because it makes me dizzy.

key_facts: [REDACTED_NAME] stopped taking [REDACTED_MEDICATION] due to side effects.
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Please speak with your doctor or pharmacist about your concerns regarding [REDACTED_MEDICATION]. They can provide further guidance and assistance. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: [REDACTED_NAME] stopped taking [REDACTED_MEDICATION] due to side effects.
